name: Endless Void (Xeroera)
description:
Endless Void is a fast paced 2D Platformer where you have to run away from the Black Hole that is following you. The only way to escape from the hole is to reach the Rift.

- 3 levels with different difficulty
- 2 Collectables 
- And a lot of Deaths incoming
Recommended Input is the Keyboard 

The Game can also be found on the Itch.io Site of the HTK.
https://htkacademy.itch.io/
This Game was the first Semester Project of the Hamburger Technische Kunsthochschule (HTK)

Install Instructions
- Download the Game from this Site
- Unpack the Zip at your prefered directory
- Start the .exe and enjoy the Game.
